title: Add link to VS2022 ProjectSystemTools extension
body:
### Context

For 64-bit VS, we had to fork the extension.

### Changes Made

Link to both versions of the extension.

### Testing

N/A

### Notes

N/A

commit.message:
Add link to VS2022 ProjectSystemTools extension

For 64-bit VS, we had to fork the extension. This change links to both versions of the extension.
